title: automated dream log updates on rss feed
description: Rss feed now automatically updates with new dream log entries, based on this tutorial: https://caffeineandlasers.neocities.org/blogs/automatingYourRSS still need to figure out how to automate rss entries which rely on javascript replacements to fit on one page rather than having a set of individual pages.

title: Added sitewide autoplay enable
description: Users can now enable and disable autoplay, and have said option persist throughout entire website without re-enabling.

title: Added WIKIFUN! page
description: Added a page full of fun wiki links! YIPPIEE!

title: Added Photos page
description: Added a page to put random photos from the depths of my hard-drive

title: Major art page refactor + MORE ART YIPPIE
description: Yeah it should be way easier to add new artwork to my website now, 11ty rocks dude.
